title: #236 - Wheeler Walker Jr. & ME
description:
Musician Wheeler Walker Jr. & I hang out in the Mancave to talk about his new album "Ol' Wheeler" which drops JUNE 2nd. We also talk about his friendship w/ Sturgill Simpson, having a number one country album, his beef with Florida Georgia Line & Luke Combs, working with David Allan Coe, how hard touring is on your body, & how fat Tom Segura is.

To Pre-Order Wheeler Walker Jr.'s New album "Ol' Wheeler" click HERE: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/ol-wheeler/id1215430053?app=itunes

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
